description: Schema definition for application-registry helm subchart values

deployment.description: Configuration properties for the deployment component

args.description: Defining the arguments for the deployment component.

requestTimeout.description: Specifies an overall time-out after which requests to the Application Registry fail to be sent. It is provided in seconds.

requestLogging.description: Enables logging incoming requests. By default, logging is disabled.

specRequestTimeout.description: Specifies a time-out after which a request fetching specifications provided by the user fails to be sent. It is provided in seconds.

assetstoreRequestTimeout.description: Specifies a time-out after which a request fetching specifications from the Asset Store fails to be sent. It is provided in seconds.

insecureAssetDownload.description: Disables verifying certificates when downloading data from the Asset Store.

insecureSpecDownload.description: Disables verifying certificates when fetching API specification from specification URL.
